import React from 'react' import {AiFillDelete} from "react-icons/ai" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { toast } from 'react-hot-toast'; import {remove} from '../redux/Slices/CartSlice' function CartItem({item,itemIndex}) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const removeFromCart = ()=>{ dispatch(remove(item.id)) toast.error("Item Removed") } return (

{item.title}

{item.description}

${item.price}

) } export default CartItem
